data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Eksi, Guelnur, Koyuncu, Mehmet, Oezkan, Ayse Mine Gencler (2016): Alliumekimianum: a new species (Amaryllidaceae) from Turkey. PhytoKeys 62: 83-93, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.62.7796, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.62.7796
